records.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
records.author: Martin Luther King

records.quote: Use what youâ€™ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
records.author: Yvonne Pierre

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

records.quote: Jag ska ta han, inte polisen ska ta han.
records.author: Lasterturken

records.quote: You either die a hero or live long enough to see yourself become the villain
records.author: Two Face

records.quote: A Hero Can Be Anyone, Even Someone Doing Something As Simple And Reassuring As Putting A Coat Around A Little Boy's Shoulders To Let Him Him Know The World Hadn't Ended
records.author: Batman

records.quote: It's not who I am underneath but what I do that defines me
records.author: Batman
